    • About Brad Cohen


    Brad Cohen balances extensive real estate market knowledge and expertise with personality and a fun-loving approach to provide his clients with a simply better buying and selling experience. His charm and wit are complemented by direct communication and a true desire to help people.

    Brad has been a top producing agent since his first year. He has been a Virginia RealtorsÂ® Spotlighted Member, grown his business annually and recorded over $7 Million in sales in 2018. To date, he has helped over 100 buyers and sellers reach their real estate goals.

    Brad is a dog dad of 2, JMU Alum, involved community leader, skydiver and craft beer enthusiast. Brad is your go-to local expert for all things Harrisonburg, real estate and beyond. Contact him anytime at 540-830-7239 or brad@bradcohenhomes.com
